summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackHSA/FSA eligibleDermalogica's PowerBright Moisturizer SPF 50 is a daily sunscreen that helps shield against future darks spots and helps combat oxidative stress caused by pollution.
details: DetailsBenefitsShields skin against dark spotsCombats oxidative stress caused by pollutionBalances skin tone and helps reduce the appearance of uneven pigmentationBest suitable for those experiencing hyperpigmented skin and uneven skin toneKey IngredientsBrown Algae: helps combat oxidative stress caused by air pollutionNiacinamide: helps reduce the appearance of uneven pigmentation and balance skin toneHyaluronic Acid: helps reduce water loss and allows skin to stay hydratedFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesSynthetic FragranceItem 2281033How To UseFollow topical application of C-12 Pure Bright by smoothing a generous amount of Pure Light SPF 50 to face and neck, avoiding the eye area, preferably 30 minutes prior to sun exposure. For best results, apply after PowerBright Dark Spot Serum.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Polysorbate 80, Dimethyl Capramide, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Lavendula Spica (Lavender) Flower Oil, Laminaria Ochroleuca Extract, Palmaria Palmata Extract, Oligopeptide-34, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Fruit Ferment Filtrate, Niacinamide, Zinc Glycinate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Polysorbate 60, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Isohexadecane, Butylene Glycol Behenate, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Follow topical application of C-12 Pure Bright by smoothing a generous amount of Pure Light SPF 50 to face and neck, avoiding the eye area, preferably 30 minutes prior to sun exposure. For best results, apply after PowerBright Dark Spot Serum.

reviews.headline: Great for my sensitive, combination skin!
reviews.comments: I've used Dermologica for a while but have only used the Intensive, Multivitamin, and Recovery moisturizers so far. I've been using this one for 2 weeks now and I've seen a huge difference in my skin tone! The dark spots on my cheeks are completely gone and the ones on my forehead are fading. It goes on great underneath the Skin perfect primer. I've used other sunscreen moisturizers before and they are always very shiny and greasy looking even after putting on make up. This one doesn't have that effect and it makes my skin glow!

reviews.headline: worth the splurge!
reviews.comments: I have had this product on my wishlist for a long time wondering if it would be worth it. I am happy to report that it is! I am somebody who is extremely prone to hyperpigmentation, like the slightest blemish leaves a lasting mark. I have used this for around a month now and the improvement is phenomenal!! it also smells absolutely heavenly üòç

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: Unfortunately this didn't agree with my sensitive skin. I have eczma and it would make my face and neck itch almost as soon as I put it on. I gave it a fair shot (I didn't want to waste it) but it nevet worked out for me

reviews.headline: Glowing Skin
reviews.comments: Listen, if you want to have Glowing Skin, no greasy, no oily look, GLOWING skin, this is it. You might find it a little thick and greasy at first, but dont be fooled! its absorbs quickly and the final look its amazing. Perfectly for using it as a primer or just under makeup. Doesn't pill at all !

reviews.headline: I really like this moisturizer!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite daytime moisturizer.  I love the fragrance and that its SPF 50. I would highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Buy the whole system
reviews.comments: You have to buy this whole system to reap the rewards. This does go on a little greasy, but it absorbs quickly. I am not one to really care about the smell of products, the biggest concern is if they work, but it does smell medicinal. I have been using this system for well over 3 years and I don't plan on switching.

reviews.headline: Bad in a bottle
reviews.comments: I have been using this for a month now. Never buy this product. First it has a aweful medicine smell, it reminds me of that nasty lip balm Carmex that they sell at gas stations. Then its geasy looking when its on your skin. I was a big fan of Dermalogica, but not anymore.

reviews.headline: It's the smell for me!!
reviews.comments: This is a great lightweight moisturizer with SPF 50. Most moisturizer has only spf 30 or less. It absorbs quickly. But I will repurchase this for the smell alone. Its smell like the pre-clense by Dermaligica, anothrr of ny favorite products.

reviews.headline: It's the smell for me!!
reviews.comments: This is a great lightweight moisturizer with SPF 50. Most moisturizer has only spf 30 or less. It absorbs quickly. But I will repurchase this for the smell alone. Its smell like the pre-clense by Dermaligica, anothrr of ny favorite products.

reviews.headline: I would buy the product again
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: Amazing and yes, I will buy this product again in a game
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for quite a bit some time and it is amazing product if you have hyperpigmentation it, take care of it hydration hydrates your skin as well and it has SPF 50 so it's like an amazing moisturizer with everything you need in your skin and I love it

reviews.headline: The most drying moisturizer
reviews.comments: I like have always liked this product line but this item felt and smelled cheap. It has the worst chemical smell of any product I've ever used and instantly sucked the moisture out of my face.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizing SPF
reviews.comments:
I use this when i dont want to wear my Tula tinted moisturizer 
Its lightweight but definitely moisturizes your skin 
It makes your skin feel firm but not tight AND it leaves a beautiful glow

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it
reviews.comments:
I love the texture of this, it goes in light and absorbs easily. So many SPF moisturizers sit on top and feel heavy on my face. 

But it burns the ever loving heck out of my eyes!

reviews.headline: Worst chemical burning in eyes
reviews.comments: This burns my eyes to the point of where I can't see. Anything meant to be put on your face needs to be eye safe!!! Returning

reviews.headline: Dermalogica Dependable
reviews.comments:
It's new to my existing  supply of Dermalogica products. I have only used it since Saturday.
So far so good

reviews.headline: Soothing and protective
reviews.comments: Terrific moisturizer with 50 SPF! This product goes on smoothly and no white hue. Love it. Grab a travel size first if you're on the fence.

reviews.headline: Lovely product!
reviews.comments: I use it every night. Goes on smooth and not harsh at all on your skin. I have seen a difference on my face, age spots fading. I will definitely continue using.

reviews.headline: Please don't put photosensitizers in sun screen
reviews.comments: This has chemicals and oils that make you sensitive to the sun. They should only be used in areas that aren't exposed to the sun. This is a better forms for night, if it didn't have a chemical sunscreen in it.

reviews.headline: Loved but the product leaked everywhere
reviews.comments: I love the product however my only complaint is that it leaked everywhere shortly after buying it!

values.label: Healed an age spot that was cracked and sore

faceoff_positive.comments: As a Dermalogica Expert and I have gotten the chance to use most dermalogica products on myself which btw I have combination skin oily T-zone and normal on the rest of my face. This product is light weight it does not make my face feel grease and it really has really helped with my sunspots also it is safe to say that even since I started using it I have gotten zero spots even during the summer... I love it!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best multitasking Sunscreen

faceoff_negative.comments: I was very dissapointed when I learned that the previous formula was discontinued. It was the best moisturizer and make up base for me and had mattifying effect for my oily skin like any other product i have tryed. The new formula is too oily and my pores look way bigger than before. I wish both formulas are available so people can choose depending on their skin type to have this moisturizer with all the other benefits that they like in this cream. Will not buy the new one and deffinetly have to find a new brand wich offers that mattifying effect.
faceoff_negative.headline: The previous formula was great
